content.p: Time Asia Internship - Hong Kong (Apply NOW!) Description: TIME Asia is now accepting applications for our Summer 2013 internship programme, which will run from 3 June 2013 to 31 August 2013. The application deadline is 4 April 2013. Job Description: Interns are responsible for fact-checking stories, researching specials and graphics, and producing content for Time.com. There are also opportunities to report and write short pieces for the magazine, as well as regular blog posts for our website. Requirements: Compensation: Interns are paid a stipend of $8,000 HKD, or roughly $1,000 USD, per month. We do not cover travel or living expenses. Application: Interested candidates should send a cover letter, a resume, and up to 5 clips to Emily_Rauhala@timeasia.com by no later than 4 April 2013. Contact: Emily Rauhala Associate Editor TIME Asia, Hong Kong Emily_Rauhala@timeasia.com telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8001
